mapper.select: SELECT ast.id, ast.user_id, ast.activity_id, ast.created_at, u.username, u.nickname, u.avatar, a.title as activity_title, LEFT(a.description, 100) as activity_description FROM activity_stars ast INNER JOIN users u ON ast.user_id = u.id INNER JOIN activities a ON ast.activity_id = a.id WHERE ast.activity_id = #{activityId} ORDER BY ast.created_at DESC
